Plot: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.
Title: Shadow of the Vampire
Actors: John Malkovich, Willem Dafoe, Udo Kier, Cary Elwes
tomatoConsensus: Shadow of the Vampire is frightening, compelling, and funny, and features an excellent performance by Willem Dafoe.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 23 nominations.
